scripts.boot: echo '=== Enter [y] to install dependencies, or [anything else] to quit ==='; read -p '>>> ' YES; if [ "$YES" != 'y' ]; then exit 0; fi; npx shx rm -fr node_modules package-lock.json; npm i; npx shx ln -f pages.json pages4loader.json5;
scripts.create: APPKEY=$(jq -r .appkey fenv.json); VERSIONCODE=`node versionCodeNow.js`; echo === Creating WEB v$VERSIONCODE ===; echo; echo $VERSIONCODE > $(eval echo $npm_package_config_versionPath)/versionCode-web-$APPKEY.json; $npm_package_config_hbxCli publish --platform h5 --project $(basename $(pwd))
scripts.deploy:
echo '=== Deploy 
 [w] WEB to cloudflare, [wg] WEB to github 
 [anything else] to quit'; read -p '>>> ' TARGET; if [ "$TARGET" = 'w' ]; then npm --silent run deploy-web-cloudflare; elif [ "$TARGET" = 'wg' ]; then npm --silent run deploy-web-github; elif [ "$TARGET" = 'a' ]; then npm --silent run deploy-apk; elif [ "$TARGET" = 'ag' ]; then npm --silent run deploy-aab-gplay; elif [ "$TARGET" = 'i' ]; then npm --silent run deploy-ipa; fi
scripts.deploy-web:
echo '=== Deploy web to 
 [c] Cloudflare 
 [g] Github 
 [anything else] to quit'; read -p '>>> ' TARGET; if [ "$TARGET" = 'c' ]; then npm --silent run deploy-web-cloudflare; elif [ "$TARGET" = 'g' ]; then npm --silent run deploy-web-github; fi
scripts.deploy-web-cloudflare: APPKEY=$(jq -r .appkey fenv.json); VERSIONCODE=$(cat $(eval echo $npm_package_config_versionPath)/versionCode-web-$APPKEY.json); echo === Deploying Web [$APPKEY-$VERSIONCODE] to Cloudflare ===; echo; wrangler pages deploy unpackage/dist/build/web --project-name=$(jq -r .cfpWebapp fenv.json) --commit-dirty=true
scripts.deploy-web-github: APPKEY=$(jq -r .appkey fenv.json); VERSIONCODE=$(cat $(eval echo $npm_package_config_versionPath)/versionCode-web-$APPKEY.json); echo === Deploying Web [$APPKEY-$VERSIONCODE] to Github ===; echo; node ./node_modules/wo-base-deployer/deploy.js --fromPath ./unpackage/dist/build/web
scripts.publish:
echo '=== Publish web to 
 [c] Cloudflare 
 [g] Github 
 [anything else] to quit'; read -p '>>> ' TARGET; if [ "$TARGET" = 'c' ]; then npm --silent run publish-web-cloudflare; elif [ "$TARGET" = 'g' ]; then npm --silent run publish-web-github; fi
scripts.publish-web-cloudflare: npm --silent run create && npm --silent run deploy-web-cloudflare
scripts.publish-web-github: npm --silent run create && npm --silent run deploy-web-github
scripts.to-reinstall-package: echo === Enter a [package name] to reinstall, [leave blank] to quit ===; read -p '>>> ' PACK; if [ "$PACK" ]; then npx shx rm -fr "node_modules/$PACK"; npm i -f "$PACK"; fi;
